atos.mae.auto.action

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • atos.mae.auto.action.Action

  • @Component
public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contain all final called methods. Used for list available method with --exportaction command line too.

        expectedText - expected text on WebElement
        Returns:

      • verifyTextOnPage

        public StepReturn verifyTextOnPage(java.lang.String data)
        Check if text is present on page.
        Parameters:
        Data - text to search
        Returns:
        Pass if text found, Fail if text not found, otherwise warn if text found more than 1 time.
